name: Jetball prototype thing
description:
Hello, you have a jetpack and can turn into a ball to bounce off of things.

I call this Jetball for 3 reasons :

  1.  there is a jetpack
  2.  there is a ball
  3.  I am terrible at naming things and this is why I don't have kids

You have to use a controller to play, keyboard/mouse aren't functional. 

Works fine with Xbox 360/One controllers, for PS4 controller you'll need DS4Windows running in the background.

Controls are displayed in-game, but just in case : Right Analog Trigger (RT) to jetpack, A to jump, B to go in and out of ball. 

Once in ball, holding RT activates slidey mode (zero bounce + heavier), and A allows you to dash out of ball (if the ball has touched something first). Dash can be aimed with left stick.

Thank you very much have a nice day.
